remarks: A line described with a projective map.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2012.)
statement:
isline2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
isline2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
isline2.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
isline2.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
linepmap $p |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> ( M ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) e. N ) $.
